name: Eclipse Now
description:
Use WASD to move and Left Click to "orient" the sword.

Eclipse Now is a physics-based game where you use a giant sword to take on hordes and hordes of enemies. As you progress through the waves , more enemies will spawn.

This game is still on (Very) Early Development, so thank you for playing and be sure to leave comments with critiques or suggestions. They are all very useful.

Be sure to follow the Instagram Page to stay updated!

https://www.instagram.com/hardcodedgames/
